declarations.markdownContent:
# [Ant Design library](https://ant.design/)

> Current version of the library: `1.0.0`

### Watch video tutorial

* [Introduction video](https://youtu.be/jeZyOjZKxYc)

### Download project template:

* Choose the appropriate boilerplate for your new project and download it to your local disk. 

| Framework | Boilerplate | Repository |
|---|---|---|
| Create React App | [Download](https://github.com/react-ui-builder/ant-design-cra-boilerplate/archive/master.zip) | [Source Code](https://github.com/react-ui-builder/ant-design-cra-boilerplate) |

### Contribute

* We will be happy if you create a new PR for this library in GitHub repo: [wcd-ant-design](https://github.com/react-ui-builder/wcd-ant-design).

## Community

* If you need any help, don't be afraid to speak up!

You can ask questions at [Spectrum chat](https://spectrum.chat/react-ui-builder)

wcdAnnotations.annotationComment:
StyledDiv is used in case when the theme styles are not enough.
 It is recommended to use it for complex layouts mostly.

Button. To trigger an operation.

 When To Use#
 A button means an operation (or a series of operations). Clicking a button will trigger corresponding business logic.

 Ant Design provides 4 types of button.

 Primary button: indicate the main action, one primary button at most in one section.

 Default button: indicate a series of actions without priority.

 Dashed button: used for adding action commonly.

 Text button: used for the most secondary action.

 Link button: used for external links.

A simple CSS grid wrapper that can be used to arrange the sections in two directions
 * horizontal layout - `row`
 * vertical direction - `column`

props.propertyComment:
An array of the placeholders for child components.
  Increase array size to put more items.
Inline styles of the component. The object is used as a style property of the div component.
If true, the button will be disabled.
If true, the button will take up the full width of its container.
make background transparent and invert text and border colors
redirect url of link button
set the original html type of button
set the icon component of button
Button label text
set the loading status of button

Triggered when the user click on the button.
 Signature: `() => void;`
can be set to circle, round or omitted
The size of the button. `small` is equivalent to the dense button styling.
same as target attribute of a, works when href is specified
can be set to 'primary' 'ghost' 'dashed' 'danger' 'link' text or omitted (meaning default)

wcdAnnotations.annotationComment:
Typography.

 Basic text writing, including headings, body text, lists, and more.

 When To Use#

 When need to display a title or paragraph contents in Articles/Blogs/Notes.

 When you need copyable/editable/ellipsis texts.

props.propertyComment: Code style
Config copy.
Delete line style
If true, the button will be disabled.
Editable. Can control edit state
Display ellipsis when text overflows. Should set width when ellipsis needed
Ellipsis props (additional settings for ellipsis)
href for link. Is used onlu for variant: "link"
Keyboard style
Set content importance. Match with h1, h2, h3, h4. Only fro variant: "title"
Marked style
Trigger when user edits the content (text: string) => void
onExpand: () => void
Bold style
Target for link
Text. Text to be shown
Content type
underline style
Typography type: Title, Text, Paragraph or Link

wcdAnnotations.annotationComment:
Button. To trigger an operation.

 When To Use#
 A button means an operation (or a series of operations). Clicking a button will trigger corresponding business logic.

 Ant Design provides 4 types of button.

 Primary button: indicate the main action, one primary button at most in one section.

 Default button: indicate a series of actions without priority.

 Dashed button: used for adding action commonly.

 Text button: used for the most secondary action.

 Link button: used for external links.

props.propertyComment: If true, the dropdown will be disabled.
If true, the button will take up the full width of its container.
make background transparent and invert text and border colors

 Signature: `() => void;`
can be set to circle, round or omitted
The size of the button. `small` is equivalent to the dense button styling.
same as target attribute of a, works when href is specified

Contents of the cells.
Defines the direction layout of the cells in the grid
Defines the justify-content style property. It is applied for all screen sizes.
Defines the justify-items style property. It is applied for all screen sizes.
Defines the space between the cells.
